content: A great game has a few bugs but overall still a great game to play. People having problems saving: check permissions allow storage access. Press save game. Press save game again in the man menu and pick a save slot.
I just found out that you are supposed to save the game in main menu and in game
Great game, not sure what all the other reviews are about. Haven't had any problems loading saving or continuing.

Read the reviews but still took a chance buying this game. Like everyone says if you close the game and come back later you need to start a new game. I wouldn't pay the $7 for this game. It feels more like a $1.99 game. Hope the game gets updates because it is fun but at the same time your left feeling .. like it could have been better.
Whenever you save the game , and load then you lose all the previous cases.Thats heart breaking .please fix this problem or return my money.
replyContent: Hey, sorry for the problem. We are working on the update that might fix the issue with saves. Send us information via email contact@gameops.pl regarding what steps you did to make this bug appear.

content: Sadly, unplayable due to bugs. The X in the corner of the windows won't close the window so progression is impossible during tutorial. Saved the game it restarted me from the beginning. This is highly disappointing as the 3 minutes I COULD play seemed fairly promising.
Lost all progress despite being connected to Google Play games and having completed a number of achievements.
replyContent: Hey, sorry for the problem. We are working on the update that might fix the issue with saves. Send us information via email contact@gameops.pl regarding what steps you did to make this bug appear.

content: Decent game, does not compare up to lots of similar games, 911 for example,. Waiting on better games
Good concept, but require a improvements, GUI is terrible.
Finally on Mobile, first purchased and played on Steam, knew then that this would make an awesome mobile game, so glad it made it.
